greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Absolute difference between largest prime factors of two successive semiprimes.
mathematica: Select[ FactorInteger[ Range[300]], Total[#[[All, 2]]] == 2 &][[All, -1, 1]] // Differences // Abs (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 03 2013 *)
results.author: _Giovanni Teofilatto_, Mar 23 2007
ext: Edited and extended by _Ray Chandler_, Mar 25 2007
